title: Contacts/Companies Analyzer Tool
spec:
## Contacts/Companies Analyzer Tool

### Goal
Give the AI the ability to analyze the user's contacts and companies database to inform strategy recommendations.

### Tools
- `search_contacts(query, filters)` — search by name, title, company, tags
- `analyze_contacts(segment)` — aggregate stats (titles, industries, company sizes)
- `search_companies(query, filters)` — search by name, industry, tier
- `analyze_companies(segment)` — tier distribution, enrichment status, industry breakdown

### Behavior
- AI uses these tools when discussing ICP, outreach strategy, or contact segmentation
- Results are summarized in natural language with key stats
- User can ask: "How many of my contacts are CTOs at Series B SaaS companies?"

### Technical Approach
- Tool handlers query PostgreSQL with parameterized filters
- Aggregate queries use SQL GROUP BY for performance
- Response format: structured JSON that AI interprets for the user
- Rate limited: max 5 tool calls per message to prevent abuse

### Acceptance Criteria
- Given user asks "who are my best contacts for enterprise sales?", the AI searches and summarizes matching contacts
- Given user asks "what industries are most represented?", the AI runs an aggregate and presents a breakdown
- Given the contact database has 2000+ records, search returns in under 2 seconds
